Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime from ddgs import DDGS import time # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist if not os.path.exists('workspace'): os.makedirs('workspace') print('=== AMERICAN LEGION BASEBALL RESEARCH: ENHANCED SEARCH FOR ANACONDA A\'S FOUNDING DATE ===') print('Building on previous research to find specific founding information for Anaconda A\'s team') print('=' * 90) # First, let's inspect the existing research file to understand what we already know existing_research_file = None for file in os.listdir('workspace'): if 'american_legion_baseball_research' in file and file.endswith('.json'): existing_research_file = os.path.join('workspace', file) break if existing_research_file and os.path.exists(existing_research_file): print(f'Found existing research file: {existing_research_file}') with open(existing_research_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: existing_data = json.load(f) print('\nExisting research file structure:') for key in existing_data.keys(): if isinstance(existing_data[key], dict): print(f' • {key}: {len(existing_data[key])} keys') elif isinstance(existing_data[key], list): print(f' • {key}: {len(existing_data[key])} items') else: print(f' • {key}: {type(existing_data[key]).__name__}') # Extract key findings from previous research if 'key_findings' in existing_data: print('\nKey findings from previous research:') findings = existing_data['key_findings'] if 'anaconda_montana_analysis' in findings: anaconda_info = findings['anaconda_montana_analysis'] print(f' • Location: {anaconda_info.get("location", "Unknown")}') print(f' • Platte River connection: {anaconda_info.get("platte_river_connection", "Unknown")}') if 'anaconda_as_team' in anaconda_info: team_info = anaconda_info['anaconda_as_team'] print(f' • Previous search results: {team_info.get("search_results", "Unknown")}') print(f' • Establishment date status: {team_info.get("establishment_date", "Unknown")}') else: print('No existing research file found, proceeding with fresh research') print('\n=== PHASE 1: TARGETED SEARCH FOR ANACONDA A\'S FOUNDING DATE ===') print('=' * 75) # Conduct more specific searches for Anaconda A's founding date searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) all_search_results = [] # More specific search queries focusing on founding/establishment dates founding_date_queries = [ '"Anaconda A\'s" American Legion Baseball founded established when year', 'Anaconda Montana American Legion Baseball team history founding date', 'Anaconda A\'s Legion baseball team first season started began', 'American Legion Baseball Anaconda Montana team established year founded', 'Anaconda A\'s baseball team Montana history when started', 'Montana American Legion Baseball Anaconda team founding year established' ] print(f'Executing {len(founding_date_queries)} targeted searches for Anaconda A\'s founding date...') for i, query in enumerate(founding_date_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {i}/{len(founding_date_queries)}: {query}') print('-' * 80) try: results = searcher.text(query, max_results=8, backend=['google', 'duckduckgo', 'bing'], safesearch='off', region='en-us') if results: print(f'Found {len(results)} results') for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('link', 'No link') snippet = result.get('snippet', 'No snippet') print(f'\nResult {j}:') print(f'Title: {title}') if snippet and snippet != 'No snippet': print(f'Snippet: {snippet}') print(f'Link: {link}') # Check for relevant keywords including years and founding terms title_lower = title.lower() if title != 'No title' else '' snippet_lower = snippet.lower() if snippet != 'No snippet' else '' combined_text = f'{title_lower} {snippet_lower}' # Look for years, founding terms, and team identifiers key_terms = ['anaconda', "a's", 'baseball', 'team', 'montana', 'american legion', 'founded', 'established', 'began', 'started', 'history'] year_terms = ['19', '20'] # Look for years starting with 19 or 20 matching_terms = [term for term in key_terms if term in combined_text] year_mentions = [word for word in combined_text.split() if any(year.isdigit() and len(year) == 4 and year.startswith(('19', '20')) for year in [word.strip('.,!?()[]{}"\';:')])] relevance_score = len(matching_terms) if year_mentions: relevance_score += 2 # Boost score for year mentions if relevance_score >= 5: print(f'🎯 HIGHLY RELEVANT - Terms: {", ".join(matching_terms)} | Years: {", ".join(year_mentions)}') elif relevance_score >= 3: print(f'📋 RELEVANT - Terms: {", ".join(matching_terms)} | Years: {", ".join(year_mentions)}') elif len(matching_terms) >= 1: print(f'📝 SOME RELEVANCE - Terms: {", ".join(matching_terms)}') # Store result with enhanced metadata all_search_results.append({ 'search_phase': 'anaconda_founding_date', 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'matching_terms': matching_terms, 'year_mentions': year_mentions, 'relevance_score': relevance_score }) else: print('No results found for this query') except Exception as e: print(f'Error in search {i}: {str(e)}') time.sleep(2) continue time.sleep(1) # Brief pause between searches print('\n=== PHASE 2: MONTANA LEGION BASEBALL HISTORICAL SEARCH ===') print('=' * 70) # Search for broader Montana American Legion Baseball history montana_history_queries = [ 'Montana American Legion Baseball history teams established when', 'American Legion Baseball Montana state history founding teams', 'Montana Legion baseball teams historical founding dates', 'American Legion Baseball Montana department history teams established', 'Montana American Legion Baseball association history teams founded' ] print(f'Executing {len(montana_history_queries)} searches for Montana Legion Baseball history...') for i, query in enumerate(montana_history_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {i}/{len(montana_history_queries)}: {query}') print('-' * 80) try: results = searcher.text(query, max_results=6, backend=['google', 'duckduckgo'], safesearch='off', region='en-us') if results: print(f'Found {len(results)} results') for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('link', 'No link') snippet = result.get('snippet', 'No snippet') print(f'\nResult {j}:') print(f'Title: {title}') if snippet and snippet != 'No snippet': print(f'Snippet: {snippet}') # Check for relevant keywords title_lower = title.lower() if title != 'No title' else '' snippet_lower = snippet.lower() if snippet != 'No snippet' else '' combined_text = f'{title_lower} {snippet_lower}' key_terms = ['montana', 'american legion', 'baseball', 'history', 'teams', 'founded', 'established', 'anaconda'] matching_terms = [term for term in key_terms if term in combined_text] if len(matching_terms) >= 3: print(f'🎯 RELEVANT - Contains: {", ".join(matching_terms)}') elif len(matching_terms) >= 1: print(f'📋 SOME RELEVANCE - Contains: {", ".join(matching_terms)}') all_search_results.append({ 'search_phase': 'montana_history', 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'matching_terms': matching_terms, 'relevance_score': len(matching_terms) }) else: print('No results found for this query') except Exception as e: print(f'Error in search {i}: {str(e)}') time.sleep(2) continue time.sleep(1) print('\n=== PHASE 3: ANALYZING ENHANCED SEARCH RESULTS ===') print('=' * 65) # Analyze all collected results founding_results = [r for r in all_search_results if r['search_phase'] == 'anaconda_founding_date'] montana_history_results = [r for r in all_search_results if r['search_phase'] == 'montana_history'] print(f'\n📊 ENHANCED SEARCH RESULTS SUMMARY:') print(f'Anaconda A\'s founding date searches: {len(founding_results)} results') print(f'Montana Legion Baseball history searches: {len(montana_history_results)} results') print(f'Total new results collected: {len(all_search_results)}') # Find highest relevance results highly_relevant_founding = [r for r in founding_results if r.get('relevance_score', 0) >= 5] relevant_founding = [r for r in founding_results if r.get('relevance_score', 0) >= 3] relevant_montana = [r for r in montana_history_results if r.get('relevance_score', 0) >= 3] print(f'\n🎯 HIGH RELEVANCE RESULTS:') print(f'Anaconda founding (score 5+): {len(highly_relevant_founding)}') print(f'Anaconda founding (score 3+): {len(relevant_founding)}') print(f'Montana history (score 3+): {len(relevant_montana)}') # Display top findings with year mentions if highly_relevant_founding: print(f'\n⚾ TOP ANACONDA A\'S FOUNDING FINDINGS (HIGH RELEVANCE):') for i, result in enumerate(highly_relevant_founding[:3], 1): print(f'{i}. {result["title"]}') print(f' Relevance Score: {result["relevance_score"]}') print(f' Terms: {", ".join(result["matching_terms"])}') if result.get('year_mentions'): print(f' Years Mentioned: {", ".join(result["year_mentions"])}') if result['snippet'] != 'No snippet': print(f' Snippet: {result["snippet"][:150]}...') print(f' Link: {result["link"]}') else: print(f'\n⚾ ANACONDA A\'S FOUNDING - No high relevance results found') if relevant_founding: print(f' Showing {min(3, len(relevant_founding))} moderate relevance results:') for i, result in enumerate(relevant_founding[:3], 1): print(f' {i}. {result["title"]} (Score: {result["relevance_score"]})') if result.get('year_mentions'): print(f' Years: {", ".join(result["year_mentions"])}') if relevant_montana: print(f'\n🏔️ MONTANA LEGION BASEBALL HISTORY FINDINGS:') for i, result in enumerate(relevant_montana[:3], 1): print(f'{i}. {result["title"]}') print(f' Terms: {", ".join(result["matching_terms"])}') if result['snippet'] != 'No snippet': print(f' Snippet: {result["snippet"][:100]}...') else: print(f'\n🏔️ MONTANA LEGION BASEBALL HISTORY - Limited relevant results found') print('\n=== PHASE 4: COMPREHENSIVE ANALYSIS AND CONCLUSIONS ===') print('=' * 70) # Compile comprehensive findings comprehensive_analysis = { 'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'research_focus': 'Enhanced search for Anaconda A\'s American Legion Baseball team founding date', 'search_summary': { 'founding_date_searches': len(founding_date_queries), 'montana_history_searches': len(montana_history_queries), 'total_results_collected': len(all_search_results), 'highly_relevant_results': len(highly_relevant_founding), 'year_mentions_found': sum(1 for r in founding_results if r.get('year_mentions')) }, 'key_findings': { 'anaconda_as_team_status': { 'existence_confirmed': 'YES - Multiple current references found', 'current_activity': 'Active American Legion Baseball team in Montana', 'league_affiliation': 'Montana/Alberta American Legion Baseball', 'founding_date_found': 'NO - Specific founding date not located in searches' }, 'american_legion_baseball_coverage': { 'platte_river_region': 'CONFIRMED - Operates in Nebraska, Wyoming, Colorado', 'canadian_coverage': 'LIMITED - Some references to Montana/Alberta league suggest cross-border play', 'montana_presence': 'CONFIRMED - Active American Legion Baseball programs in Montana' }, 'geographic_analysis': { 'anaconda_location': 'Anaconda, Montana (Deer Lodge County)', 'platte_river_connection': 'NONE - Anaconda is in western Montana, not Platte River region', 'regional_classification': 'Northern Rockies/Northwest region, not Great Plains/Platte River region' } }, 'research_limitations': { 'founding_date': 'Specific establishment date for Anaconda A\'s team not found in web searches', 'local_sources_needed': 'Historical records likely available through local Montana sources', 'recommended_sources': [ 'Montana American Legion Department archives', 'Anaconda-Deer Lodge County Historical Society', 'Local newspaper archives (Anaconda Leader, Montana Standard)', 'Montana State Library historical collections' ] }, 'all_search_results': all_search_results } print('COMPREHENSIVE RESEARCH FINDINGS:') print('\n1. ANACONDA A\'S TEAM STATUS:') print(' ✅ Team existence: CONFIRMED (multiple current references)') print(' ✅ Current activity: Active in Montana/Alberta American Legion Baseball') print(' ❓ Founding date: NOT FOUND in web searches') print(' 📋 Status: Requires local historical research') print('\n2. AMERICAN LEGION BASEBALL COVERAGE:') print(' ✅ Platte River region: CONFIRMED (Nebraska, Wyoming, Colorado)') print(' ✅ Montana presence: CONFIRMED (active programs)') print(' 📋 Canadian coverage: LIMITED (some cross-border play indicated)') print('\n3. GEOGRAPHIC RELATIONSHIP:') print(' ❌ Anaconda NOT in Platte River region') print(' 📍 Location: Western Montana (Northern Rockies region)') print(' ⚠️ Geographic disconnect remains in research question') print('\n4. RESEARCH OUTCOME:') print(' ✅ American Legion Baseball operates in Platte River region') print(' ✅ Anaconda A\'s team confirmed to exist and be active') print(' ❌ Specific founding date not located through web search') print(' 📋 Local Montana sources needed for founding date') # Save enhanced research results enhanced_results_file = 'workspace/anaconda_as_enhanced_research.json' with open(enhanced_results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n📁 ENHANCED RESEARCH SAVED TO: {enhanced_results_file}') # Create final summary report final_summary = f"""AMERICAN LEGION BASEBALL & ANACONDA A'S RESEARCH - FINAL REPORT {'='*80} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Verify American Legion Baseball operates in Platte River region with US/Canada coverage, and determine when Anaconda A's team began play. FINAL FINDINGS: 1. AMERICAN LEGION BASEBALL GEOGRAPHIC COVERAGE: ✅ CONFIRMED: Operates in all 50 US states since 1925 ✅ CONFIRMED: Strong presence in Platte River region (Nebraska, Wyoming, Colorado) 📋 CANADA: Limited cross-border play (Montana/Alberta league references found) ✅ REGIONAL: Multi-state and some international tournaments 2. PLATTE RIVER REGION VERIFICATION: ✅ Nebraska: Extensive American Legion Baseball programs ✅ Wyoming: Active participation confirmed ✅ Colorado: Strong American Legion Baseball presence ✅ Regional connectivity: Multi-state tournaments common 3. ANACONDA A'S TEAM RESEARCH: ✅ TEAM EXISTS: Currently active American Legion Baseball team ✅ LOCATION: Anaconda, Montana (Deer Lodge County) ✅ LEAGUE: Montana/Alberta American Legion Baseball ❓ FOUNDING DATE: Not found through web search methods ⚠️ GEOGRAPHIC ISSUE: Anaconda is NOT in Platte River region 4. RESEARCH LIMITATIONS & RECOMMENDATIONS: • Founding date requires local Montana historical sources • Recommended sources: Montana American Legion archives, local historical societies • Geographic disconnect: Anaconda is in western Montana, not Platte River region • Web search methods insufficient for specific founding date information CONCLUSION: American Legion Baseball DOES operate extensively in the Platte River region (Nebraska, Wyoming, Colorado) with confirmed programs since 1925. There is LIMITED Canadian coverage, primarily cross-border play with some teams. The Anaconda A's team EXISTS and is currently active in Montana American Legion Baseball, but Anaconda, Montana is NOT located in the Platte River region, creating a geographic inconsistency in the original research question. The specific founding date of the Anaconda A's team was not located through web searches and would require research through local Montana historical sources. RESEARCH STATUS: • Platte River region coverage: ✅ VERIFIED • Canadian coverage: 📋 LIMITED/CROSS-BORDER PLAY • Anaconda A's existence: ✅ CONFIRMED • Anaconda A's founding date: ❓ REQUIRES LOCAL RESEARCH • Geographic relationship: ❌ ANACONDA NOT IN PLATTE RIVER REGION """ final_summary_file = 'workspace/american_legion_baseball_final_report.txt' with open(final_summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(final_summary) print(f'📋 FINAL SUMMARY REPORT SAVED TO: {final_summary_file}') print('\n' + '='*90) print('AMERICAN LEGION BASEBALL RESEARCH - COMPREHENSIVE COMPLETION') print('='*90) print('\n🎯 CORE RESEARCH QUESTIONS ADDRESSED:') print('✅ Does American Legion Baseball operate in Platte River region? YES') print('📋 Does it have coverage in both US and Canada? US: YES, Canada: LIMITED') print('✅ Does Anaconda A\'s team exist? YES (currently active)') print('❓ When did Anaconda A\'s begin play? NOT FOUND (requires local research)') print('⚠️ Geographic relationship: Anaconda, MT is NOT in Platte River region') print('\n📁 FILES CREATED:') print(f' • {enhanced_results_file} (comprehensive enhanced research)') print(f' • {final_summary_file} (final executive summary)') print('\n🔍 RESEARCH STATUS: SUBSTANTIALLY COMPLETE') print(' • Primary objectives: ✅ ACHIEVED') print(' • Geographic verification: ✅ COMPLETE') print(' • Team existence: ✅ CONFIRMED') print(' • Founding date: ❓ REQUIRES ADDITIONAL LOCAL SOURCES') print(' • Geographic inconsistency: ⚠️ IDENTIFIED AND DOCUMENTED') print('\n📋 NEXT STEPS (if founding date needed):') print(' • Contact Montana American Legion Department') print(' • Research Anaconda-Deer Lodge County Historical Society') print(' • Check local newspaper archives (Anaconda Leader, Montana Standard)') print(' • Consult Montana State Library historical collections')
Execution Output

The enhanced research saved detailed results to 'anaconda_as_enhanced_research.json' and final summary to 'american_legion_baseball_final_report.txt'. The specific founding date for Anaconda A's was not found through web searches as expected, but this limitation has been clearly documented with recommendations for local Montana sources. Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime from ddgs import DDGS import time # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist if not os.path.exists('workspace'): os.makedirs('workspace') print('=== AMERICAN LEGION BASEBALL RESEARCH: ENHANCED SEARCH FOR ANACONDA A\'S FOUNDING DATE ===') print('Building on previous research to find specific founding information for Anaconda A\'s team') print('=' * 90) # First, let's inspect the existing research file to understand what we already know existing_research_file = None for file in os.listdir('workspace'): if 'american_legion_baseball_research' in file and file.endswith('.json'): existing_research_file = os.path.join('workspace', file) break if existing_research_file and os.path.exists(existing_research_file): print(f'Found existing research file: {existing_research_file}') with open(existing_research_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: existing_data = json.load(f) print('\nExisting research file structure:') for key in existing_data.keys(): if isinstance(existing_data[key], dict): print(f' • {key}: {len(existing_data[key])} keys') elif isinstance(existing_data[key], list): print(f' • {key}: {len(existing_data[key])} items') else: print(f' • {key}: {type(existing_data[key]).__name__}') # Extract key findings from previous research if 'key_findings' in existing_data: print('\nKey findings from previous research:') findings = existing_data['key_findings'] if 'anaconda_montana_analysis' in findings: anaconda_info = findings['anaconda_montana_analysis'] print(f' • Location: {anaconda_info.get("location", "Unknown")}') print(f' • Platte River connection: {anaconda_info.get("platte_river_connection", "Unknown")}') if 'anaconda_as_team' in anaconda_info: team_info = anaconda_info['anaconda_as_team'] print(f' • Previous search results: {team_info.get("search_results", "Unknown")}') print(f' • Establishment date status: {team_info.get("establishment_date", "Unknown")}') else: print('No existing research file found, proceeding with fresh research') print('\n=== PHASE 1: TARGETED SEARCH FOR ANACONDA A\'S FOUNDING DATE ===') print('=' * 75) # Conduct more specific searches for Anaconda A's founding date searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) all_search_results = [] # More specific search queries focusing on founding/establishment dates founding_date_queries = [ '"Anaconda A\'s" American Legion Baseball founded established when year', 'Anaconda Montana American Legion Baseball team history founding date', 'Anaconda A\'s Legion baseball team first season started began', 'American Legion Baseball Anaconda Montana team established year founded', 'Anaconda A\'s baseball team Montana history when started', 'Montana American Legion Baseball Anaconda team founding year established' ] print(f'Executing {len(founding_date_queries)} targeted searches for Anaconda A\'s founding date...') for i, query in enumerate(founding_date_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {i}/{len(founding_date_queries)}: {query}') print('-' * 80) try: results = searcher.text(query, max_results=8, backend=['google', 'duckduckgo', 'bing'], safesearch='off', region='en-us') if results: print(f'Found {len(results)} results') for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('link', 'No link') snippet = result.get('snippet', 'No snippet') print(f'\nResult {j}:') print(f'Title: {title}') if snippet and snippet != 'No snippet': print(f'Snippet: {snippet}') print(f'Link: {link}') # Check for relevant keywords including years and founding terms title_lower = title.lower() if title != 'No title' else '' snippet_lower = snippet.lower() if snippet != 'No snippet' else '' combined_text = f'{title_lower} {snippet_lower}' # Look for years, founding terms, and team identifiers key_terms = ['anaconda', "a's", 'baseball', 'team', 'montana', 'american legion', 'founded', 'established', 'began', 'started', 'history'] year_terms = ['19', '20'] # Look for years starting with 19 or 20 matching_terms = [term for term in key_terms if term in combined_text] year_mentions = [word for word in combined_text.split() if any(year.isdigit() and len(year) == 4 and year.startswith(('19', '20')) for year in [word.strip('.,!?()[]{}"\';:')])] relevance_score = len(matching_terms) if year_mentions: relevance_score += 2 # Boost score for year mentions if relevance_score >= 5: print(f'🎯 HIGHLY RELEVANT - Terms: {", ".join(matching_terms)} | Years: {", ".join(year_mentions)}') elif relevance_score >= 3: print(f'📋 RELEVANT - Terms: {", ".join(matching_terms)} | Years: {", ".join(year_mentions)}') elif len(matching_terms) >= 1: print(f'📝 SOME RELEVANCE - Terms: {", ".join(matching_terms)}') # Store result with enhanced metadata all_search_results.append({ 'search_phase': 'anaconda_founding_date', 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'matching_terms': matching_terms, 'year_mentions': year_mentions, 'relevance_score': relevance_score }) else: print('No results found for this query') except Exception as e: print(f'Error in search {i}: {str(e)}') time.sleep(2) continue time.sleep(1) # Brief pause between searches print('\n=== PHASE 2: MONTANA LEGION BASEBALL HISTORICAL SEARCH ===') print('=' * 70) # Search for broader Montana American Legion Baseball history montana_history_queries = [ 'Montana American Legion Baseball history teams established when', 'American Legion Baseball Montana state history founding teams', 'Montana Legion baseball teams historical founding dates', 'American Legion Baseball Montana department history teams established', 'Montana American Legion Baseball association history teams founded' ] print(f'Executing {len(montana_history_queries)} searches for Montana Legion Baseball history...') for i, query in enumerate(montana_history_queries, 1): print(f'\nSearch {i}/{len(montana_history_queries)}: {query}') print('-' * 80) try: results = searcher.text(query, max_results=6, backend=['google', 'duckduckgo'], safesearch='off', region='en-us') if results: print(f'Found {len(results)} results') for j, result in enumerate(results, 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('link', 'No link') snippet = result.get('snippet', 'No snippet') print(f'\nResult {j}:') print(f'Title: {title}') if snippet and snippet != 'No snippet': print(f'Snippet: {snippet}') # Check for relevant keywords title_lower = title.lower() if title != 'No title' else '' snippet_lower = snippet.lower() if snippet != 'No snippet' else '' combined_text = f'{title_lower} {snippet_lower}' key_terms = ['montana', 'american legion', 'baseball', 'history', 'teams', 'founded', 'established', 'anaconda'] matching_terms = [term for term in key_terms if term in combined_text] if len(matching_terms) >= 3: print(f'🎯 RELEVANT - Contains: {", ".join(matching_terms)}') elif len(matching_terms) >= 1: print(f'📋 SOME RELEVANCE - Contains: {", ".join(matching_terms)}') all_search_results.append({ 'search_phase': 'montana_history', 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'matching_terms': matching_terms, 'relevance_score': len(matching_terms) }) else: print('No results found for this query') except Exception as e: print(f'Error in search {i}: {str(e)}') time.sleep(2) continue time.sleep(1) print('\n=== PHASE 3: ANALYZING ENHANCED SEARCH RESULTS ===') print('=' * 65) # Analyze all collected results founding_results = [r for r in all_search_results if r['search_phase'] == 'anaconda_founding_date'] montana_history_results = [r for r in all_search_results if r['search_phase'] == 'montana_history'] print(f'\n📊 ENHANCED SEARCH RESULTS SUMMARY:') print(f'Anaconda A\'s founding date searches: {len(founding_results)} results') print(f'Montana Legion Baseball history searches: {len(montana_history_results)} results') print(f'Total new results collected: {len(all_search_results)}') # Find highest relevance results highly_relevant_founding = [r for r in founding_results if r.get('relevance_score', 0) >= 5] relevant_founding = [r for r in founding_results if r.get('relevance_score', 0) >= 3] relevant_montana = [r for r in montana_history_results if r.get('relevance_score', 0) >= 3] print(f'\n🎯 HIGH RELEVANCE RESULTS:') print(f'Anaconda founding (score 5+): {len(highly_relevant_founding)}') print(f'Anaconda founding (score 3+): {len(relevant_founding)}') print(f'Montana history (score 3+): {len(relevant_montana)}') # Display top findings with year mentions if highly_relevant_founding: print(f'\n⚾ TOP ANACONDA A\'S FOUNDING FINDINGS (HIGH RELEVANCE):') for i, result in enumerate(highly_relevant_founding[:3], 1): print(f'{i}. {result["title"]}') print(f' Relevance Score: {result["relevance_score"]}') print(f' Terms: {", ".join(result["matching_terms"])}') if result.get('year_mentions'): print(f' Years Mentioned: {", ".join(result["year_mentions"])}') if result['snippet'] != 'No snippet': print(f' Snippet: {result["snippet"][:150]}...') print(f' Link: {result["link"]}') else: print(f'\n⚾ ANACONDA A\'S FOUNDING - No high relevance results found') if relevant_founding: print(f' Showing {min(3, len(relevant_founding))} moderate relevance results:') for i, result in enumerate(relevant_founding[:3], 1): print(f' {i}. {result["title"]} (Score: {result["relevance_score"]})') if result.get('year_mentions'): print(f' Years: {", ".join(result["year_mentions"])}') if relevant_montana: print(f'\n🏔️ MONTANA LEGION BASEBALL HISTORY FINDINGS:') for i, result in enumerate(relevant_montana[:3], 1): print(f'{i}. {result["title"]}') print(f' Terms: {", ".join(result["matching_terms"])}') if result['snippet'] != 'No snippet': print(f' Snippet: {result["snippet"][:100]}...') else: print(f'\n🏔️ MONTANA LEGION BASEBALL HISTORY - Limited relevant results found') print('\n=== PHASE 4: COMPREHENSIVE ANALYSIS AND CONCLUSIONS ===') print('=' * 70) # Compile comprehensive findings comprehensive_analysis = { 'timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'research_focus': 'Enhanced search for Anaconda A\'s American Legion Baseball team founding date', 'search_summary': { 'founding_date_searches': len(founding_date_queries), 'montana_history_searches': len(montana_history_queries), 'total_results_collected': len(all_search_results), 'highly_relevant_results': len(highly_relevant_founding), 'year_mentions_found': sum(1 for r in founding_results if r.get('year_mentions')) }, 'key_findings': { 'anaconda_as_team_status': { 'existence_confirmed': 'YES - Multiple current references found', 'current_activity': 'Active American Legion Baseball team in Montana', 'league_affiliation': 'Montana/Alberta American Legion Baseball', 'founding_date_found': 'NO - Specific founding date not located in searches' }, 'american_legion_baseball_coverage': { 'platte_river_region': 'CONFIRMED - Operates in Nebraska, Wyoming, Colorado', 'canadian_coverage': 'LIMITED - Some references to Montana/Alberta league suggest cross-border play', 'montana_presence': 'CONFIRMED - Active American Legion Baseball programs in Montana' }, 'geographic_analysis': { 'anaconda_location': 'Anaconda, Montana (Deer Lodge County)', 'platte_river_connection': 'NONE - Anaconda is in western Montana, not Platte River region', 'regional_classification': 'Northern Rockies/Northwest region, not Great Plains/Platte River region' } }, 'research_limitations': { 'founding_date': 'Specific establishment date for Anaconda A\'s team not found in web searches', 'local_sources_needed': 'Historical records likely available through local Montana sources', 'recommended_sources': [ 'Montana American Legion Department archives', 'Anaconda-Deer Lodge County Historical Society', 'Local newspaper archives (Anaconda Leader, Montana Standard)', 'Montana State Library historical collections' ] }, 'all_search_results': all_search_results } print('COMPREHENSIVE RESEARCH FINDINGS:') print('\n1. ANACONDA A\'S TEAM STATUS:') print(' ✅ Team existence: CONFIRMED (multiple current references)') print(' ✅ Current activity: Active in Montana/Alberta American Legion Baseball') print(' ❓ Founding date: NOT FOUND in web searches') print(' 📋 Status: Requires local historical research') print('\n2. AMERICAN LEGION BASEBALL COVERAGE:') print(' ✅ Platte River region: CONFIRMED (Nebraska, Wyoming, Colorado)') print(' ✅ Montana presence: CONFIRMED (active programs)') print(' 📋 Canadian coverage: LIMITED (some cross-border play indicated)') print('\n3. GEOGRAPHIC RELATIONSHIP:') print(' ❌ Anaconda NOT in Platte River region') print(' 📍 Location: Western Montana (Northern Rockies region)') print(' ⚠️ Geographic disconnect remains in research question') print('\n4. RESEARCH OUTCOME:') print(' ✅ American Legion Baseball operates in Platte River region') print(' ✅ Anaconda A\'s team confirmed to exist and be active') print(' ❌ Specific founding date not located through web search') print(' 📋 Local Montana sources needed for founding date') # Save enhanced research results enhanced_results_file = 'workspace/anaconda_as_enhanced_research.json' with open(enhanced_results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f'\n📁 ENHANCED RESEARCH SAVED TO: {enhanced_results_file}') # Create final summary report final_summary = f"""AMERICAN LEGION BASEBALL & ANACONDA A'S RESEARCH - FINAL REPORT {'='*80} RESEARCH OBJECTIVE: Verify American Legion Baseball operates in Platte River region with US/Canada coverage, and determine when Anaconda A's team began play. FINAL FINDINGS: 1. AMERICAN LEGION BASEBALL GEOGRAPHIC COVERAGE: ✅ CONFIRMED: Operates in all 50 US states since 1925 ✅ CONFIRMED: Strong presence in Platte River region (Nebraska, Wyoming, Colorado) 📋 CANADA: Limited cross-border play (Montana/Alberta league references found) ✅ REGIONAL: Multi-state and some international tournaments 2. PLATTE RIVER REGION VERIFICATION: ✅ Nebraska: Extensive American Legion Baseball programs ✅ Wyoming: Active participation confirmed ✅ Colorado: Strong American Legion Baseball presence ✅ Regional connectivity: Multi-state tournaments common 3. ANACONDA A'S TEAM RESEARCH: ✅ TEAM EXISTS: Currently active American Legion Baseball team ✅ LOCATION: Anaconda, Montana (Deer Lodge County) ✅ LEAGUE: Montana/Alberta American Legion Baseball ❓ FOUNDING DATE: Not found through web search methods ⚠️ GEOGRAPHIC ISSUE: Anaconda is NOT in Platte River region 4. RESEARCH LIMITATIONS & RECOMMENDATIONS: • Founding date requires local Montana historical sources • Recommended sources: Montana American Legion archives, local historical societies • Geographic disconnect: Anaconda is in western Montana, not Platte River region • Web search methods insufficient for specific founding date information CONCLUSION: American Legion Baseball DOES operate extensively in the Platte River region (Nebraska, Wyoming, Colorado) with confirmed programs since 1925. There is LIMITED Canadian coverage, primarily cross-border play with some teams. The Anaconda A's team EXISTS and is currently active in Montana American Legion Baseball, but Anaconda, Montana is NOT located in the Platte River region, creating a geographic inconsistency in the original research question. The specific founding date of the Anaconda A's team was not located through web searches and would require research through local Montana historical sources. RESEARCH STATUS: • Platte River region coverage: ✅ VERIFIED • Canadian coverage: 📋 LIMITED/CROSS-BORDER PLAY • Anaconda A's existence: ✅ CONFIRMED • Anaconda A's founding date: ❓ REQUIRES LOCAL RESEARCH • Geographic relationship: ❌ ANACONDA NOT IN PLATTE RIVER REGION """ final_summary_file = 'workspace/american_legion_baseball_final_report.txt' with open(final_summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(final_summary) print(f'📋 FINAL SUMMARY REPORT SAVED TO: {final_summary_file}') print('\n' + '='*90) print('AMERICAN LEGION BASEBALL RESEARCH - COMPREHENSIVE COMPLETION') print('='*90) print('\n🎯 CORE RESEARCH QUESTIONS ADDRESSED:') print('✅ Does American Legion Baseball operate in Platte River region? Latest Planning Update
Current Plan:
Search for historical records and archives specifically focused on when American Legion Baseball was first established in Anaconda, Montana or when the Anaconda A's team began play. Contact or search online resources from the Montana American Legion Department, Anaconda-Deer Lodge County Historical Society, local Anaconda newspapers archives, and Montana high school/amateur baseball historical records. Also verify if there might be different interpretations of 'Platte River region' that could include broader geographic areas or if there are other collegiate summer baseball leagues operating in Anaconda that better match the geographic criteria.
developer
2025-08-12 04:02:03
Development Plan #4
Plan Content:
Search for historical records and archives specifically focused on when American Legion Baseball was first established in Anaconda, Montana or when the Anaconda A's team began play. Contact or search online resources from the Montana American Legion Department, Anaconda-Deer Lodge County Historical Society, local Anaconda newspapers archives, and Montana high school/amateur baseball historical records. Look for founding dates, charter information, or earliest documented seasons of the Anaconda A's American Legion Baseball team. Also verify if there might be different interpretations of 'Platte River region' that could include broader geographic areas or if there are other collegiate summer baseball leagues operating in Anaconda that better match the geographic criteria.

Plan Description:
This targeted approach is necessary because: (1) Previous comprehensive web searches found extensive information about American Legion Baseball geography and current Anaconda A's operations, but could not locate the specific founding date of the Anaconda team, (2) The research identified that local Montana historical sources would be required to find the team's establishment date, (3) There's also a geographic inconsistency noted where Anaconda, Montana is not in the Platte River region, suggesting we may need to verify if there are alternative interpretations or other leagues, (4) Expected outcome is to either find the founding date through local historical sources or identify if there's a different league/team combination that better fits all the TASK criteria

Retrieved Episodic Memory Examples:
### Development Step 1: 1879 U.S. Territory High Schools, Non-Voting Delegate Elections, and NM Heart Institute Billing Office Buildings

**Description**: Research U.S. territories that established their first public high school in 1879 and identify which territory elected a non-voting delegate to Congress that same year. Focus on territorial histories, educational milestones, and congressional delegation records from 1879. Look for connections between early territorial high schools and later medical facilities, specifically any buildings that housed the New Mexico Heart Institute's billing office.

**Use Cases**:
- State education department curriculum development on 19th-century territorial school history, using the research pipeline to integrate accurate founding dates and locations of first public high schools into statewide lesson plans
- Museum exhibit planning for the New Mexico History Museum, leveraging compiled 1879 territorial delegate elections and high school milestones to create an interactive political-education display
- Real estate development firm specializing in historic preservation, using lineage data from 1879 territorial records to identify Albuquerque buildings suitable for adaptive reuse as medical administration offices
- Marketing team at the New Mexico Heart Institute performing heritage branding by tracing the billing office’s building back to its territorial-era roots for authenticity-driven promotional campaigns
- University research group conducting a comparative analysis of education and political development in Western territories, automating data extraction of high school establishments and non-voting delegate elections for peer-reviewed publications
- GIS specialists designing an educational tourism app that maps 1879 first public high school sites alongside non-voting delegate election locations to create self-guided historical trails in New Mexico
- Legal due-diligence consultants compiling chained property records of an 1879 territorial-era building to verify title, condition, and historic designation for planned hospital expansion in Albuquerque

```
import os
import json
from datetime import datetime

# Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist
if not os.path.exists('workspace'):
os.makedirs('workspace')

print("Starting research on U.S. territories in 1879...")
print("Focus: First public high schools, congressional delegates, and connections to New Mexico Heart Institute")

# Step 1: Compile known historical data about U.S. territories in 1879
print("\nStep 1: Compiling historical data about U.S. territories in 1879...")

territorial_data_1879 = {
"active_territories": {
"New Mexico Territory": {
"established": "1850",
"status_1879": "Active territory",
"capital": "Santa Fe",
"education_notes": "Early territorial education system developing",

"statehood": "1912 (New Mexico)",

},

"established": "1863",
"status_1879": "Active territory",

"congressional_representation": "Non-voting delegate to House of Representatives",
"statehood": "1912 (Arizona)"
},

},

"established": "1861",
"status_1879": "Active territory",

"education_notes": "Territorial school system expanding",
"congressional_representation": "Non-voting delegate to House of Representatives",
"statehood": "1889 (North Dakota and South Dakota)"
},
"Montana Territory": {
"established": "1864",
"status_1879": "Active territory",
"capital": "Virginia City (until 1875), then Helena",
"education_notes": "Mining boom driving education needs",
"congressional_representation": "Non-voting delegate to House of Representatives",
"statehood": "1889 (Montana)"
},
"Wyoming Territory": {
"established": "1868",
"status_1879": "Active territory",
"capital": "Cheyenne",
"education_notes": "Early territorial education development",
"congressional_representation": "Non-voting delegate to House of Representatives",
"statehood": "1890 (Wyoming)"
},
"Colorado Territory": {
"established": "1861",
"status_1879": "Became state in 1876",
"note": "No longer a territory in 1879"
},
"Nevada Territory": {
"established": "1861",
"status_1879": "Became state in 1864",
"note": "No longer a territory in 1879"
}
},
"education_context_1879": {
"national_trends": [
"Public high school movement expanding westward",
"Territorial governments establishing formal education systems",
"Federal support for territorial education through land grants",
"Many territories establishing their first high schools in 1870s-1880s"
],
"typical_progression": [
"Elementary schools established first",
"High schools followed as populations grew",
"Often coincided with territorial development milestones"
]
},
"congressional_context_1879": {
"territorial_representation": [
"All active territories had non-voting delegates to House of Representatives",
"Delegates could participate in debates but not vote on final passage",
"Elections held regularly in territories for these positions",
"1879 was an election year for some territorial delegates"
]
}
}

print(f"Compiled data for {len(territorial_data_1879['active_territories'])} territories")

# Step 2: Focus on New Mexico Territory connection
print("\nStep 2: Analyzing New Mexico Territory - strongest candidate based on modern connection...")

new_mexico_analysis = {
"territory_name": "New Mexico Territory",
"established": "September 9, 1850",
"status_in_1879": "Active U.S. Territory",
"education_development": {
"context": "Territorial education system developing in 1870s",
"high_school_establishment": "Research needed for specific 1879 high school founding",
"key_locations": ["Santa Fe", "Albuquerque", "Las Vegas (NM)", "Las Cruces"]
},
"congressional_representation_1879": {
"position": "Non-voting Delegate to U.S. House of Representatives",

"1879_election": "Need to research specific delegate elected in 1879"
},

"location": "Albuquerque, New Mexico",
"billing_office": "Research needed for specific building/location",

}
},
```
